dict.acceptation: 开刀；（对…）动手术；动手术；（在某地）采取军事行动；

sent.orig: The outline of BOT styleBOT is called Build-Operate-Transfer for short, we often call it BOT style.
sent.trans: BOT是英文Build-Operate-Transfer的简称，即“建造-经营-转让”，一般称这种投资方式为BOT方式。

sent.orig: No matter which machine he operate, he operate it carefully.
sent.trans: 不管他操作哪一台机器他都细心地操作。

sent.orig: Thesources can operate in parallel to grid or can operate in island, providing UPS services.
sent.trans: 既可以与电网并行工作，也可以独立运行，提供不间断供电服务。

sent.orig: For the most part, however, they do not operate very differently from their peers.
sent.trans: 最大的原因是，他们与竞争对手的运作方式没有太多的不同。
